channel.title: CVE Feed for SonicWall -- SonicWall SMA1000
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SonicWall -- SonicWall SMA1000

item.title: CVE-2022-1701|2024-08-03T00:10:03.912Z -- sonicwall -- sonicwall%20sma1000
item.description: SonicWall SMA1000 series firmware 12.4.0, 12.4.1-02965 and earlier versions uses a shared and hard-coded encryption key to store data.

item.title: CVE-2022-1702|2024-08-03T00:10:03.816Z -- sonicwall -- sonicwall%20sma1000
item.description: SonicWall SMA1000 series firmware 12.4.0, 12.4.1-02965 and earlier versions accept a user-controlled input that specifies a link to an external site and uses that link in a redirect which leads to Open redirection vulnerability.
